text: Chernigovsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Tlyaumbetovsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 61 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 45 km from Mrakovo, 3 km from Tlyaumbetovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Chernigovsky, Republic of Bashkortostan
